nodes.text: Hance Rugel was a Twi'lek male who served as the Special Aide to Supreme Chancellor Leontyne Saresh of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War against the Sith Empire. He handled the Chancellor's communications.
Hance Rugel appears in hologram form in "Day of Dread," the introductory mission for the Daily Area of Oricon that was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.4.
